member.name: P:OmniSharp.Models.AutoCompleteRequest.WantDocumentationForEveryCompletionResult
member.summary: Specifies whether to return the code documentation for each and every returned autocomplete result.

member.name: P:OmniSharp.Models.AutoCompleteRequest.WantImportableTypes
member.summary: Specifies whether to return importable types. Defaults to false. Can be turned off to get a small speed boost.

member.name: P:OmniSharp.Models.AutoCompleteRequest.WantMethodHeader
member.summary: Returns a 'method header' for working with parameter templating.

member.name: P:OmniSharp.Models.AutoCompleteRequest.WantSnippet
member.summary: Returns a snippet that can be used by common snippet libraries to provide parameter and type parameter placeholders

member.name: P:OmniSharp.Models.AutoCompleteRequest.WantKind
member.summary: Returns the kind (i.e Method, Property, Field)

member.name: P:OmniSharp.Models.FindUsagesRequest.OnlyThisFile
member.summary: Only search for references in the current file

member.name: M:OmniSharp.Documentation.DocumentationConverter.ConvertDocumentation(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the xml documentation string into a plain text string.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild.SectionBlock
member.summary:
Represents a SectionBlock in a .sln file. Section blocks are of the form:
Type(ParenthesizedName) = Value Key = Value [more keys/values] EndType
